Items.Name: Mat
Items.LookDescription: A rubber mat saying 'Welcome to Zork!' lies here.

Items.Name: Mailbox
Items.LookDescription: There is a small mailbox here.

Items.Name: Leaves
Items.LookDescription: There is a pile of leaves here.

Items.Name: Scroll
Items.LookDescription: A withered scroll is on ground creating small light.

Items.Name: Key
Items.LookDescription: A key to something lies here.

Items.Name: Sword
Items.LookDescription: A shining sword lies on the ground here.

Items.Name: Axe
Items.LookDescription: A sharp axe rests on the ground.

Items.Name: Dagger
Items.LookDescription: A small but pointy dagger lies here.

Items.Name: Coconut
Items.LookDescription: A coconut good for smashing things is ready to be picked up here.

Items.Name: Apple
Items.LookDescription: A glistening red apple shines from the ground.
Items.EatDescription: You took a giant chomp of the apple and took out the worm inside.

Items.Name: Orange
Items.LookDescription: A sugary orange rests on the ground, surprisingly it isn't covered in dirt.
Items.EatDescription: You peeled the orange and ate each slice.

Items.Name: Pear
Items.LookDescription: The greenest pear you've ever seen is at your feet.
Items.EatDescription: You took a nice big bite out of the pear.

Items.Name: Mushroom
Items.LookDescription: A great red and white mushroom from the Mushroom Tree lies on the ground.
Items.EatDescription: You think you're getting dizzy, but you just ate a normal mushroom.

Items.Name: Banana
Items.LookDescription: A nice ripe banana is ready for the taking at your feet.
Items.EatDescription: You ate the whole banana, peel and all.

Items.Name: Peach
Items.LookDescription: A nice fresh looking peach stares at you from the ground.
Items.EatDescription: You just ate a peach, good job!

Items.Name: Plum
Items.LookDescription: A nice juicy plum just wants you to take it.
Items.EatDescription: You figured out how to eat a plum, and then you ate it.

Items.Name: Mango
Items.LookDescription: The perfect mango lies at you feet hoping you don't miss it.
Items.EatDescription: You took a nice big bite out of the mango, with the skin on.

Items.Name: Melon
Items.LookDescription: A giant melon lies here, and is somehow not rolling away.
Items.EatDescription: You just ate an entire melon whole...

Enemies.Name: Goblin
Enemies.Description: A goblin has appeared and wants to fight you.
Enemies.DefeatDescription: The goblin slowly fell to the ground.

Enemies.Name: Golem
Enemies.Description: A large bulky Golem guards the top of the Rocky Pillars.
Enemies.AttackDescription: The Golem swung one of its large rock hands at you.
Enemies.DefeatDescription: The Golem disassemble into a bunch of small pebbles.

Enemies.Name: Wolf
Enemies.Description: One hungry Wolf can't get you out of its sight.
Enemies.AttackDescription: The Wolf ran up and bit you.
Enemies.DefeatDescription: The Wolf howled as it fell to the ground.

Enemies.Name: Troll
Enemies.Description: A large menacing Troll stands in front of the Mushroom Tree.
Enemies.AttackDescription: The Troll punched you and told you to leave.
Enemies.DefeatDescription: The Troll fell and knocked its head on a branch.

Enemies.Name: Witch
Enemies.Description: A scary Witch appeared out of nowehere is mad at you for some reason.
Enemies.AttackDescription: The Witch splashed on of her potions on you.
Enemies.DefeatDescription: The Witch drank one of her potions and flew away.

Rooms.Name: West of House
Rooms.Description: This is an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door.

Rooms.Name: North of House
Rooms.Description: You are facing the north side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are barred.

Rooms.Name: South of House
Rooms.Description: You are facing the south side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are barred.

Rooms.Name: Behind House
Rooms.Description: You are behind the white house. In one corner of the house there is a small window which is slightly ajar.

Rooms.Name: Forest 1
Rooms.Description: This is a forest, with trees in all directions around you.

Rooms.Name: Forest 2
Rooms.Description: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around. A trail of mushrooms lead north.

Rooms.Name: Forest 3
Rooms.Description: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around. To the east, there appears to be sunlight. You can see a riverbed to the south.

Rooms.Name: Forest 4
Rooms.Description: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around. A rocky path to the south and east and a mushroom path to the norht.

Rooms.Name: Clearing
Rooms.Description: You are in a clearing, with a forest to the west and rocky path to the south.

Rooms.Name: Rocky Forest Entrance
Rooms.Description: The entrance to a rocky forest, some legends speak of a mysterious monster at the top of the pillars.

Rooms.Name: River Crossing
Rooms.Description: You are at a river with bridge atop it leading south.

Rooms.Name: Rocky Pillars
Rooms.Description: You've reached part of the Rocky Pillars in a rocky forest with more forest west and a steap rcok path to the east.

Rooms.Name: Rocky Pillars 2
Rooms.Description: You've reached part of the Rocky Pillars in a rocky forest. West leads you to the top of the Pillars but a huge rock stops you from returning east.

Rooms.Name: Top of the Pillars
Rooms.Description: Above the trees, you can see all the land including the house to the north. A large rock blocks your way east. It feels like you're walking on a pebble carpet.

Rooms.Name: Mushroom Patch
Rooms.Description: You've reached a mushroom patch filled with mushrooms and freaky sounds. There's large trees all around and peculiar mushroom tree to the north.

Rooms.Name: Mushroom Patch 2
Rooms.Description: You've reached a mushroom patch filled with mushrooms and freaky sounds. There's large trees all around and peculiar mushroom tree to the west.

Rooms.Name: The Mushroom Tree
Rooms.Description: You are at the front of a large mushroom tree with strange and twisting branches blocking all light.
